title: [Glatoph, Icy Passage]
description: The ceiling seems too thin here, allowing a brief ray of light to enter the room and dance among the icicles stretching from above to meld with the floor.  The light reflects off the walls, forming a rainbow pattern the width of the room.

The ceiling seems too thin here, allowing a brief ray of moonlight to enter the room and dance among the icicles stretching from above to meld with the floor.  The light reflects off the walls, forming a rainbow pattern the width of the room.
